Summary: I was driving home from work and saw this ship hoovering over my truck.
divs: Sighting Detailscoming home one night from work there was this ship that just came out nowhere and hoovered in front my truck.I slow down and it stay with me right in front of my truck . I follow it for about 3 miles it then turned in to a field and stop.I stop and watch it for about 5-6 min it had a light looking for something in the field .so I just drove off.It was still there the whole time I was on that road till I turned.I wish now I had gotting out and appoch it.
